3 Day Split - Greyskull LP Method

Monday - Full Body SetsxReps Wednesday - Full Body SetsxReps Friday - Full Body SetsxReps
Bench Press 2x5, 1x AMRAP Overhead Press 2x5, 1x AMRAP Bench Press 2x5, 1x AMRAP
Squat 2x5, 1x AMRAP Deadlift 2x5, 1x AMRAP Squat 2x5, 1x AMRAP
Barbell Row 3x8-10 Split Squat 3x8-10 Romanian Deadlift 3x8-10
Hamstring Curl 3x12-15 Close-Grip Bench 3x8-10 Barbell Row 3x8-10
Tricep Pushdown 3x12-15 Pull-up 3x8-10 Tricep Pushdown 3x12-15
Bicep Curl 3x12-15 Bicep Curl 3x12-15 Hammer Curl 3x12-15
Dumbbell Lateral Riases 3x12-15 Cable Lateral Raises 3x12-15 Dumbbell Lateral Raises 3x12-15
